item.description:
From Our Members Stan and Barry-Please follow directions to RSVP below!

Our Mohegan Sun chartered bus trip on January 18th with Doo-Wop concert is selling out fast and we can only guarantee tickets to the concert until Jan. 10th. Our last trip to Mohegan Sun was a sell-out and we were forced to turn away many people.

Here’s what you will receive:
- A chartered bus from Newton (Riverside bus terminal) and
Framingham (Shopper’s World - glass bus stop opposite Olive
Garden and Barners & Noble).
- A spectacular buffet meal
- Free bets on the Wheel of Fortune
- A ticket to Bowzer’s Doo-Wop concert, staring: Jay & the Americans “Come a Little Bit Closer”; The Shirelles “Soldier Boy”; The Drifters “Up on the Roof”; The Tokens “The Lion Sleeps Tonight”; Gene Chandler “Duke of Earl”; and many more.
To reserve your space send a check for $69.00 with the registration form to:

Date Me I'm Jewish at P.O Box 82, Brockton, MA. 02303-0082.
We also accept PayPal. Our email address is Datemeimjewish@hotmail.com. Be sure to include your name, cell and home telephone, trip with or without concert, and Newton or Framingham pick-up with your PayPay payment. All sales are final.

For further information contact Barry at 508-333-1466 or Stan at 508-572-9049
or email us at datemeimjewish@hotmail.com

Cut here - - - > Reservation Form – Your information will remain confidential ------

Name _____________________________________________________________________

Email ______________________________________________________________________

Home Tel: (_______) __________________ Cell: (_______) ________________________

Pick up / drop off ___ Newton ___ Framingham

Package wanted: With concert $69 ___ Without concert $45 ___
Amount enclosed $_______
item.name: Mohegan Sun Trip with Doo Wap concert by Date Me I'm Jewish!
